english.segment1: You said all that follow You may find. Comfort and pain, blessings in hard times. Were I to leave, where else would I go?. The words of life and of truth you hold
english.segment2: All I want is love. I confess to this. I will take it, Lord. All You have to give
english.segment3: Turn your eyes upon Jesus. Look full in His wonderful face. And the things of Earth. Will grow strangely dim. In the light of His glory and grace
english.segment4: And you give yourself away. And you give yourself away. And you give. And you give. And you give yourself away
english.segment5: All I want is love. And I confess to this. I will take it, Lord. All You have to give. All You have to give. All You have. All You have to give
english.segment6: Your love, oh Lord. Reaches to the heavens. Your faithfulness stretches to the sky. And Your righteousness is like the mighty mountains. Your justice flows like the ocean's tides
english.segment7: And I will lift my voice. To worship You, my King. I will find my strength. In the shadow of Your wings
english.segment8: Your love, oh Lord. Reaches to the heavens. Your faithfulness stretches to the sky
